title: ‘Severance’ and ‘Abbott Elementary’ Are Big Hits—and Reveal Our Complicated Feelings About Work
sub_head: Whether at the office or working remotely, people are still obsessed with TV shows about work
body:
Hollywood’s latest crop of work-related shows are gritty and complicated. And they are captivating audiences across the country.
The shows, “Severance,” “Abbott Elementary” and “Human Resources,” are, by turns, trippy, winsome and an absolute raunch fest. As radically different as they are from one another, all mirror the ambivalence that many people have felt about their jobs, work-life balance and co-worker camaraderie during the Covid-19 era.
